questions.question: Determine the times of the last events in the first and last process, assuming the first two processes have a clock increment of 1 and the last two processes have a clock increment of 2, and also whether they are concurrent

explanations.a: The event at the end of process 1 and the event at the end of process 4 do not eappear in each other's causality chains
explanations.b: The event at the end of process 1 and the event at the end of process 4 do not eappear in each other's causality chains
explanations.c: The clock increment for the bottom two processes is 2. Also, the event at the end of process 1 and the event at the end of process 4 do not appear in each other's causality chains
explanations.d: The clock increment for the bottom two processes is 2
